price: 53. Mise waxay qayb ku leeyihiin Boqortoo- yada (Alle)? markaase, ma ay siinayaan dadka kolay ku tahay xuubka ku dahaaran lafta timirta.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am lahum naṣībun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan lā yu'tūna al-nāsa naqīran
translations: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed
